channel.title: Need A Hoster Please
channel.description: My Server Is Called Pure-Pain. It Is A Richscape Based Server But i have Heavlly Edited It And Put Lots Of Monsters Drops And That I Am A Coder And I Do Now How To Code Propoly. I am Looking For A Hoster For This Server As I Cannot Host Myself. If you Are Willing To Host For Me , You Will Get Admin On Our Server (If you want to play). You Will Not Be Ignored On the Server You Will Be As Important As the Real Admins. Please Post Here If You Would Host Thankyou. Oh- And Also You MUST Have MSN. (so i can send the updated files :))
